home.title: Atencio
home.subtitle: Booking Page + AI Receptionist for Local Businesses
home.description: Create your free booking page and let AI handle customer inquiries 24/7
home.example: Example: If your link is atencio.app/joe-plumbing, enter "joe-plumbing"
home.easyBookingDesc: Customers can book your services instantly, no account needed
home.aiReceptionistDesc: AI-powered chat handles common questions automatically
home.emailConfirmationsDesc: Automatic email confirmations sent from your business email
home.yourOwnLinkDesc: Share your unique booking page link with customers
home.haveBookingLinkDesc: Enter your business booking link below to view available services

booking.title: Book Service
booking.name: Name
booking.confirmationMessage: Your booking has been confirmed! A confirmation email will be sent to your email address.
booking.noBookingsDesc: Your bookings will appear here once customers start booking your services.

feedback.title: How was your experience?
feedback.description: We'd love to hear your feedback about your recent appointment.
feedback.thankYou: Thank you! Your feedback helps improve the service.
feedback.alreadySubmittedMessage: You have already submitted feedback for this appointment. Thank you!
feedback.noFeedbackDesc: Customer feedback will appear here once appointments are completed and customers submit feedback.

chat.greeting: Hi! Need help booking or have a question?
chat.chatDescription: Get instant answers about our services, hours, and more
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again or contact the business directly.
chat.suggestionTitle: Would you like me to book this for you?
chat.suggestionMessage: I can guide you through availability and help you schedule a session.
chat.suggestionHint: Scroll down to see available services below

providerDashboard.title: Dashboard
providerDashboard.shareLink: Share this link with your customers to let them book your services:
providerDashboard.needProfile: You need to create your provider profile first before adding services or viewing bookings.
providerDashboard.noServicesDesc: Add your first service to get started

businessBooking.businessNotFoundDesc: The business page you're looking for doesn't exist.
businessBooking.noServicesAvailable: No services available at this time.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.pastDate: Date must be in the future

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

services.title: My Services
services.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this service?

providerProfile.title: Provider Profile
providerProfile.slugHelp: This will be your booking page URL (e.g., atencio.app/your-slug)

faqs.title: Manage FAQs
faqs.question: Question
faqs.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this FAQ?
faqs.description: Add frequently asked questions and answers that will help the AI customer service assist your customers better. The AI will use these FAQs to provide accurate and consistent answers.
faqs.displayOrderHelp: Lower numbers appear first. Use this to control the order of FAQs.
faqs.active: Active (FAQ will be used by AI customer service)
faqs.noFAQsDesc: No FAQs yet. Click "Add FAQ" to get started!
faqs.noFAQsHelp: FAQs help the AI customer service answer common questions accurately and consistently.
faqs.placeholderQuestion: e.g., What are your business hours?
faqs.placeholderAnswer: e.g., We are open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and Saturday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and phone number to reset your password

setupProgress.title: Complete Your Setup
setupProgress.allComplete: All Set! Your Atencio Assistant is Ready
setupProgress.readyMessage: Share your booking page link with customers to start receiving bookings.
setupProgress.completeSetupFirst: Please complete all setup steps before sharing your page.
setupProgress.step1Desc: Add your business name and description
setupProgress.step1Helper: Your business name and description help customers find and understand what you offer. Add a clear, compelling description of your services.
setupProgress.step2Helper: Services are what customers can book. Add at least one service with clear pricing and description to get started.
setupProgress.step3Helper: Setting your business hours tells customers when they can book appointments. Set at least one day with available hours.
setupProgress.step4Desc: Create at least 3 frequently asked questions
setupProgress.step4Helper: FAQs help customers understand your services and answer common questions. Add at least 3 FAQs to improve customer experience.
setupProgress.step5Desc: Share your booking page with customers
